rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a reception area, incorporating natural elements and bohemian decor.

rooms.name: Living Room / Dining Area
rooms.description: A spacious, multi-functional area with comfortable seating and bohemian-inspired wall art. Integrates indoor plants for a natural ambiance.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen with an open layout, equipped with natural stone countertops and vibrant colors to complement the bohemian theme.

rooms.name: Garage / Utility Room
rooms.description: A dual-purpose space featuring a two-car garage with integrated storage, aligning with modern design and ease of access.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact yet functional bathroom with natural lighting and bohemian decorative tiles.

openings.description: Large French doors leading from the living room to a private outdoor space.
Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living area, enhancing natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (1BHK)
rooms.description: A comfortable master bedroom designed for relaxation with bohemian textiles and natural wood accents. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning the bed towards the north.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated private gym area with state-of-the-art equipment, ensuring a quiet and isolated workout space.

rooms.name: Balcony / Terrace
rooms.description: A relaxing outdoor terrace with bohemian decor, providing a space for meditation and relaxation.

openings.description: Sliding door from the master bedroom to the balcony for an airy feel.
Large windows in the gym area to enhance light and ventilation, with privacy screens.
